posts.post_content:
Hi looking to sell all of these the Johnson would take a good offer for me to part with the others less so. Email me for photos

T206 Walter Johnson Portrait PSA 2 Sweet Caporal- Good looking w/ small wrinkle Would take a real good offer, leaning towards keeping it
T206 Gandil PSA 1 Piedmont SOLD
T206 Gabby Street PSA 1 Piedmont- Bit of Paper loss on back SOLD
T206 Bull Durham PSA 2 Sweet Caporal SOLD

T201 Cicotte/Thoney PSA 2 SOld
T201 McCabe/Starr PSA 2 Sold
T201 Leifield/Simon PSA 2 Sold

Signed PSA/DNA authenticated and Cased Smokey Joe Wood Index Card

3 years out of touch on the market and none of these cards really have bids on ebay, so I assume they are overpriced, so I can't really put a price down, however, I am really looking to move all of them except for the johnson, so think lower end offers and mid range on the johnson

[quote name="hoesh91" post=868229]3 years out of touch on the market and none of these cards really have bids on ebay, so I assume they are overpriced...[/QUOTE]

Are they currently on eBay?  If so, can you give us a link?
